description.en:
Alternate fan translation of volume 0.2 of [Honkai Impact 3rd](https://mangadex.cc/title/22297/honkai-impact-3rd).  
  
"On February 1st, 2000. The entire man research staff of Shicksals Babylon facility in Siberia disappeared overnight. While Theresa investigates this mystery under orders from Otto, Walter and Einstein make preparation for *her* appearence. The stage is set for the second Honkai Impact."  
  
Timeline : Set 14 years before the start of the game.   
  
Arc is completed in CN and by official MiHoYo manga team - HOMU Comics.  


---

Main Story :   
[# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3#)   
[# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3#)   
[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.cc/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)   
[# Book 1006 = Anti-Enthrophy Invasion](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)  
[# Book 1007 = Gratitude Arc](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)
